message.content:
1. Neuroinflammation is persistent in traumatic brain injury (TBI).
2. Disruptions in brain energy metabolism are common in traumatic brain injury (TBI).
3. Traumatic brain injury (TBI) can cause neuroinflammation.
4. Traumatic brain injury (TBI) can cause disruptions in brain energy metabolism.

messages.content:
Statement: Persistent neuroinflammation and disruptions in brain energy metabolism is commonly seen in traumatic brain injury (TBI).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
